mapper.insert:
insert into UCMD_TGJ_INTERFACE ( id,cityname,callingnumber,callednumber,starttalktime,talktime,createtime,type,called_city_name )
SELECT sys_guid(), #{item.cityname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callingnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.callednumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(item.starttalktime,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{item.talktime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sysdate, 4, #{item.called_city_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM dual
